name: Slimeing Around
description:
Español Historia

Cori, un slime elemental que no sabe controlar sus emociones, es llamado por su maestro mientras duerme placidamente para que vaya a buscar una poción que necesita. Pero su mal despertar provocará que causo diferentes estragos por el camino.

Créditos

Andrea Marco -  Lead 3D artist  & Environment Artist.

Antonio Benito Fernández - 3D artist .

 Lucas Matías González - Lead Programmer .

Andrea Fernández Fernández  -  Game Design.

Maria Vargas - Lead 2D artist & 2D artist .

Adrían Martinez Arias - Composer & Sound Designer.

Videojuego desarrollado en un periodo de 48h para la Global Game Jam 2022.

English Story

Cori, an elemental slime who doesn't know how to control his emotions, is called by his master while he is sleeping soundly to go get a potion he needs. But her bad awakening will cause her to cause different havoc along the way.

Credits

Andrea Marco -  Lead 3D artist  & Environment Artist.

Antonio Benito Fernández - 3D artist .

Lucas Matías González - Lead Programmer .

Andrea Fernández Fernández  -  Game Design.

Maria Vargas - Lead 2D artist & 2D artist .

Adrían Martinez Arias - Composer & Sound Designer.

Videogame developed in a period of 48h for the Global Game Jam 2022.
